title: Greentea OS
coming-soon_we-are-working: We are working very hard on the new version of our site. It will bring a lot of new features. Stay tuned!
about-us:
Warm and cozy, open-source operating system compatible with apps, games and drivers

The main idea of the project is to quickly and efficiently create a compatible environment for the existing software and provide the best user experience of a personal computer.
description: Greentea OS is a free operating system written from scratch, but more user and production oriented. We would first make it *actually* usable for day-to-day use.
footer_made-by: Site is created by Greentea OS team and contributors. Green tea is like coffee, Greentea is like OS. Greentea OS is fine too :)
